content: licht hat textured chunky hat pattern licht hat if you love a quick but interesting project this pattern is for you enjoy learning new stitches while creating an adorable cosy hat that s perfect for last minute gifts this fun project combines cluster stitches and cables to create embossed trees on the surface of the fabric the accompanying step-by-step tutorial video will guide you through each unusual stitch licht knits up quickly in bulky yarn almost instant gratification whether you re making a last minute gift or taking a moment to knit for yourself plus it s just the right length for cosying up with a holiday movie or two and of course it wouldn t be complete without a cute pom pom table of contents pattern support use this table of contents to find your way around this pattern has been thoroughly tech edited and the pattern or print only the pages for the pattern tested and we hope you find it clear and easy to version or additional guidance that you need follow if you have a question that isn t covered in the pattern accompanying videos or our support the pattern page or if you think you ve found an error please key information page 3 email support@ysolda com abbreviations page 4 directions page 5 share your project charts page 6 we love seeing your works in progress and finished projects use the hashtag #lichthat and tag @ysolda so that we don t miss them
